climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: 【KEEP ITEMS NEAT AND ORGANIZED】 Great for labeling storage bins, boxes, food containers, and more. This label maker with smart App control lets you label things with names, barcodes, QR codes, text, emojis, and other pre-made templates.

【WHY CHOOSE SUPVAN】With 18 years of experience in the printing industry and over 20 service centers worldwide, SUPVAN is committed to delivering excellent customer support and top-notch products to the global market.

【HIGH CLARITY & COST EFFECTIVE】SUPVAN label machine uses inkless thermal technology which means you can enjoy higher clarity without relying on printer ink or toner. This SUPVAN labeler helps you save money, time and effort.

【EASY TO USE】The smart App provides over 600 templates including various fonts, texts, graphics, symbols, icons, and more. Customize your own label maker just in a second through your phone or pad. Support iOS 13.0+ and Android 8.0+.

【PORTABLE AND DURABLE】The handheld design of the mini SUPVAN E10 label machine lets you to carry and use in any places. The rechargeable battery can even last up to a full month’s use on a single charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the SUPVAN E10 Label Printer and have been impressed with its performance. The wireless connectivity via Bluetooth on the app is extremely user friendly, and the setup was very straightforward.The machine itself is compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry around and use in different locations. The printing quality is excellent, with clear and crisp text and graphics although emojis seem to come out bad. The label maker also comes with a range of customization options, allowing me to choose from different font styles and sizes.One of the standout features of this label maker is its compatibility with the SUPVAN app, which allows for even more customization and ease of use. The app is intuitive and user-friendly, making it easy to create and print labels on the go.I highly recommend the SUPVAN E10 Printer for anyone in need of a reliable and efficient label maker. Its compact size, wireless connectivity, and impressive printing quality make it a great choice for both personal and professional use.I got this product so I could label my world banknotes. I was able to label 46 of them while using about 4 inches of label per banknote sometimes more. I thought it would run out a lot sooner than it did, there is quite a bit of label tape per roll.The cost of getting new rolls is a bit expensive, $9.99$, but the fact I don't have to buy ink makes it much better. Just with the roll it comes with when buying it you should be able to label just about everything. I saw another review saying they didn't receive a roll with the product, but when I got mine, it had a roll of continuous label ready to go + charged.Edit: April 19th, 2023. I bought a refillable roll and accidentally purchased the small labels instead of the longer continuous white labels. Happy accident, the smaller labels look more professional and last longer than the continuous label tape. instead of being able to label just 40+ banknotes I was able to label all 50+ of my coins, and nearly all 100+ banknotes. I highly recommend buying this label maker plus the smaller labels that aren't continuous. The small labels are perfect for labeling coins/banknotes because of their size. Small enough to fit a label on a coin holder, yet large enough to be able to fit all the needed details. You can find the refills here; https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09JP4FMCF?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_detailsAlso, I don't see why anyone has a problem with this product regarding their data collection policy, most companies have similar policies including the one we are all shopping from.Edit July 14th, 2023; Product still works great. I love how easy this makes labeling my coins, and it makes it look professional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little tool!
reviews.reviewText: The app works with this tool so seamlessly and gets the job done. Prints out perfect labels with so much room to customize. Highly recommend for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very functional, includes roll of tape.
reviews.reviewText: Ver functional - can print long continuous labels, or on pre-sized individual labels.Software app works well, but not most straightforward to use. 20' roll refills 2 for $10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Updated - Tape doesn't move
reviews.reviewText: Update:Exchanged and the new one came in a smaller, newer, basic looking box. The new printer looks the same, but works. Perfectly. Smooth, fast, easy to use. Worth the purchase. Support never replied.Previous: 1 star.Simple design. Easy to setup. First use didn't work. The printer is not able to move the tape. Leaves a verticle line from the print and the tape staying stationary. Sent email for support. Waiting on reply. Will update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: This little label maker is perfect for what wanted it for: label containers with food to go in the freezer.It’s easy to operate, just the right size and it surprisingly has quite a few options as far as size, font , etc. are concerned. I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This label maker is super easy to connect on my phone. Need to follow the instructions attached, and open bluetooth on the phone. The App UI is simplistic and easy to use. The labels have stickers on the back so I could stick them on multiple surfaces easily. Print quality is excellent as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick, intuitive, and great for organizing and travel.
reviews.reviewText: I prefer to make my own travel sized bottles for shampoo, conditioner, serum, even perfume. This labelmaker makes that job so much easier and less expensive than purchasing all the smaller versions (if you can even find them) of your favorites.I also use it to label my storage tubs so I can easily tell which tub has what when needed.👍👍👍Big bonus, you don’t water label product as it clips right at the end vs leaving a long tail at the front and back.$$$$

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much love this little thing
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up for the first time, easy to use, great options for font styles and size, letter spacing and multiple rows, etc. I’m at risk of becoming one of those people who put labels on everything. My only quibble is that it wastes a lot of tape between printings.

The media could not be loaded. I wanted a small labeler I could print labels for charging wires and cables so I l own what goes with what device. This worked perfectly and was very easy to set up. Came already charged too so I could test it right away. The tape is easy too by having a split down the middle to easily take the backing off to stick where needed. I don't think this would hold up on clothing though if washed. I think it would just come off not like other brands such as Mabel labels. I've only tested printing in black so I'm not sure if there is a coloured option yet. It'll be great for labeling my kids stuff too so they don't mix them up if they both have the same toy. Has price barcodes too if someone has a small business and price tags.
molto semplice da usare e molto pratico

Das Produkt ist sehr handlich und kompakt. Es erfüllt seinen Zweck und hat eine sehr gute druck Qualität. Auch die Verbindung mit der App funktioniert tadellos. Daher eine klare Kaufempfehlung von mir

Drukarka przydatna. Możliwość drukowania etykiety o dowolnej długości i kilku wierszach (+symbole) na plus. Taśma w zestawie. Dwie apk w sklepie Google Play.Taśmy mają zaszyte pod naklejką zabezpieczenie NFC odczytywane przez urządzenie, więc jeśli zamiennik musi mieć taką opcję (do sprawdzenia na przyszłość możliwość przeklejenia z oryginału).
